column6: Reclamation has a licensing request on file with the SWRCB.  Reclamation also has a petition for indefinite change on file with the SWRCB for implementation of the San Joaquin River Restoration Program.  Reclamation understands that the licensing effort will continue after the SWRCB issues an order on this petition.

column12: Petition has been filed to extend time period to maximize beneficial use.

column6: Reclamation is working with State Water Board staff toward licensing.
Reclamation is working with state water board staff toward licensing.
column12: An extension of time request has been filed and the EIR process is underway.  Additional storage needs to be constructed.
The water spreading works are of such nature that routine and continuing construction is needed to repair and build dikes, smooth land, etc. to force water underground.
